name: Tung-Tung Tycoon
description:
Tung-tung! The distinctive sound of the kenong being hit makes you nostalgic for the past. In those days, as a child, you played until you were full of sweat and ended up under a tree to enjoy tung-tung ice. However, can children now feel the excitement? I don't know, why don't you try to create a beautiful childhood for them?

Build your tung-tung ice business now and make them nostalgic!

Feature:
🌟 Two modes: Career Mode and Challenge Mode
🌟 Recipes - Arrange recipes to your heart's content and discover the best recipes ever
🌟 Supply - Buy ingredients and get discount
🌟 Rent - Choose a suitable location for your business
🌟 Equipment - Buy new equipment to help with your job
